about-me.title: About Me
about-me.description: I am a developer with training in web applications and a specialization in video games and virtual reality. Since childhood, I have been passionate about computing, video games, and technology.

education.title: Education
education.description-1: I studied the Higher Degree in Web Application Development at IES Rafael Alberti (C√°diz), where I learned frontend and backend development with technologies such as JavaScript, Java, PHP, Python, and frameworks like Vue and React.
education.description-2: Later, I completed the Specialization Course in Video Games and Virtual Reality, where I worked with Unity and Godot, programming in C# and GDScript, and creating experiences in virtual and mixed reality. I participated in collaborative projects and events such as the M√°laga Jam 2025.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: I am interested in continuing to grow as a developer in web or interactive projects, combining creativity, technology, and clean code.

availability.title: Availability
description: I am currently available for new projects and collaborations. If you have an interesting idea or need a developer for your team, feel free to contact me.
I am available for remote work and can integrate immediately.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have worked on various web development and video game projects, both independently and in teams. Here are some highlighted examples:

games.name: Midnight Gallery
games.description: Midnight Gallery is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements in which you play as Kassia, a daring adventurer exploring the darkest and most mysterious corners of history. Her goal is to recover forgotten relics and treasures to enrich a museum dedicated to preserving humanity‚Äôs legacy. Throughout her journey, Kassia will face physical challenges, puzzles, and traps that will test her wit and skills.

games.name: Los Giros
games.description: Los Giros is a game where the world is in 3D, but both the enemies and the environments are represented in 2D. You play as John Colt, a bounty hunter who must eliminate all enemies standing in his way.

games.name: GlobRush
games.description: In this game, the character‚Äôs organs play a key role in the difficulty. Each organ has an ‚Äúoxygen‚Äù percentage, and if it drops below a certain level, ‚Äúnegative effects‚Äù are triggered that increase the challenge of the game.

languages-card.title: Languages
languages-card.description: I have an advanced level of English, which allows me to understand and communicate fluently in this language. I also have a native level of Spanish, enabling me to work and collaborate on projects in this language without issues.
